1370: Deghen moved to Davids hof.B.1 after marriage.
Got married to Hadewigis at age 32 in 1370.
Had a son with Hadewigis, Eligius, at age 32.
1371: Had a son with Hadewigis, Trueb, at age 33.
1374: Had a daughter with Hadewigis, Jute, at age 36.
1376: Had a son with Hadewigis, Sylawert, at age 38.
1378: Lost son Trueb when Trueb was 8 years old.
1379: Had a daughter with Hadewigis, Salome, at age 41.
1380: Had a son with Hadewigis, Alwin, at age 42.
1382: Had a son with Hadewigis, Paradanus, at age 44.
